What is your name?: I am a chatbot powered by deep learning.
How are you?: I'm a chatbot, so I don't have feelings, but I'm here to help!
What can you do?: I can answer your questions using AI technology.
Who created you?: I was built using Python and deep learning models like BERT.
What is AI?: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence, enabling machines to think and learn.
What is deep learning?: Deep learning is a subset of AI that uses neural networks to process data.
BERT is a deep learning model developed by Google for NLP tasks.
What is machine learning?: Machine learning is a field of AI that enables computers to learn from data.
What programming languages do you use?: I am built using Python, with libraries like PyTorch and TensorFlow.
What is natural language processing?: NLP is a branch of AI that enables computers to understand and process human language.
Who is Alan Turing?: Alan Turing was a pioneer in computer science and artificial intelligence.
